thread.section_title: Laptopscreen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laptopscreen | www.laptopscreen.com
thread.title: Devin Spranger

author: Devin Spranger
title: Devin Spranger
text: Received laptop screen very quickly it was double packed with a bubble wrap envelope. I removed my old screen and opened the new screen upon opening I thought the screen was shattered due to rough handleing at the sorting facilities the screen looked spider webbed. I then thought maybe the liquid was just cold. I was upset but decided to install it to see how bad the damage was . Anyway I installed it and took off the protective coating and wallah the screen was flawless. Sorry I doubted you guy ! Powered up the computer and after a long year I finally have a screen without blotches through the middle ! Thanks !
